results.title: Metformin use is associated with a lower risk of osteoporosis/vertebral fracture in Taiwanese patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ use is associated with a lower risk of OS/@<m>DISEASE_Spondylocostal_dysostosis_autosomal_recessive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535781 @@@VF@@@.

citations.NLM: Tseng CH. Metformin use is associated with a lower risk of osteoporosis/vertebral fracture in Taiwanese patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus. Eur J Endocrinol. 2021 Feb;184(2):299-310. PMID: 33270043
citations.BibTeX: @article{33270043, title={Metformin use is associated with a lower risk of osteoporosis/vertebral fracture in Taiwanese patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.}, author={Tseng CH}, journal={Eur J Endocrinol}, volume={184}, number={2}, pages={299-310}}

results.title: Vertebral fractures in males with type 2 diabetes treated with rosiglitazone.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @<m>DISEASE_Spondylocostal_dysostosis_autosomal_recessive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535781 @@@Vertebral fractures@@@ were found in 46.5% of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ males (p=0.06 vs. control subjects) with higher prevalence in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_Rosiglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077154 @@@rosiglitazone@@@ plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as compared with those under treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alone (66.7% vs. 27.3%; p=0.01).

citations.NLM: Mancini T, Mazziotti G, Doga M, Carpinteri R, Simetovic N, Vescovi PP, Giustina A. Vertebral fractures in males with type 2 diabetes treated with rosiglitazone. Bone. 2009 Oct;45(4):784-8. PMID: 19527806
citations.BibTeX: @article{19527806, title={Vertebral fractures in males with type 2 diabetes treated with rosiglitazone.}, author={Mancini T and Mazziotti G and Doga M and Carpinteri R and Simetovic N and Vescovi PP and Giustina A}, journal={Bone}, volume={45}, number={4}, pages={784-8}}

results.title: Risk of fractures and diabetes medications: a nationwide cohort study.
results.text_hl: Compared to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@SU@@@ users, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ + DPP4-I users showed a trend of lower non-@<m>DISEASE_Spondylocostal_dysostosis_autosomal_recessive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535781 @@@vertebral fracture@@@ risk (HR = 0.82, P = 0.086) after adjusting for all confounding variables.

citations.NLM: Choi HJ, Park C, Lee YK, Ha YC, Jang S, Shin CS. Risk of fractures and diabetes medications: a nationwide cohort study. Osteoporos Int. 2016 Sep;27(9):2709-2715. PMID: 27080708
citations.BibTeX: @article{27080708, title={Risk of fractures and diabetes medications: a nationwide cohort study.}, author={Choi HJ and Park C and Lee YK and Ha YC and Jang S and Shin CS}, journal={Osteoporos Int}, volume={27}, number={9}, pages={2709-2715}}
